author: Staff Reporter
Karthik Madhavan
text:
Students go on a fast

Around 20 students of the CBM College of Arts and Science are on a fast on the campus from Monday evening demanding that basic amenities be provided, and faculty appointed. The students said that management had not heeded to their requests for a long time.

A few weeks ago, the students, faculty, and management representatives had a meeting in the presence of officials from the Higher Education Department. Though the management representatives promised to improve the infrastructure, nothing was done.

The students said that they would continue their protests until their demands were met.
title: For page three city. CBM college students go on fast
